author: Chris Topher <c@creemama.com>
devDependencies-comments: npm WARN @babel/cli@7.2.3 requires a peer of @babel/core@^7.0.0-0 but
none is installed. You must install peer dependencies yourself.
name: utiljs

scripts.package-lock: git clean -fdx --exclude "node-home-dir" && npm install --save-exact && npx lerna exec "npm install --package-lock-only --save-exact" && ./scripts/install.sh
scripts.test: npm run build && npx lerna exec --ignore "@util.js/lerna" -- mocha

scripts-comments: Lerna may or may not update package-lock.json files. package-lock.json
is not included in bundles posted to npm. Run the script after as the
